verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] pulled the US out of the Iran nuclear deal , and the oil producer will now face economic sanctions . China is poised to benefit as it is Iran 's largest oil consumer , and it will likely use the opportunity to use its yuan currency and gain international clout for its money .
